Module jGame

Package jGame.core.serializable

This package contains classes responsible for serialization of game states, entities and hud elements, storing important values for later use.
Since:
1.1.0
Author:
Nuno Pereira
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    EntitySerializer
    Class responsible for serializing entities.
    GameSerializer
    Class responsible for the serialization of the game in its current state.
    GameStateSerializer  
    SpriteSerializer
